# PLAYER::IS_WANTED_AND_HAS_BEEN_SEEN_BY_COPS

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
returns true if player is wanted and has been seen at least once by cops.
